front.title: Conformity Statement of Layer-2 aided mobility independent dormant host alerting protocol to RFC 3154

abstract.t: This document states the conformity of Layer-2 aided mobilityindependent dormant host alerting protocol I-D to RFC 3154 onRequirements and Functional Architecture for an IP Host AlertingProtocol. It is stated to which clauses lahap fully conforms and towhich clauses close to full conformance is claimed.
